metadata.description: In this dramatic 4-issue crossover, the 10th Muse teams up with Mike Baron's fan favorite "The Badger."  When the time stream is weakened, The10th Muse is thrust into a dark future where Mt. Olympus has been destroyed, and the pantheon of the Gods is now hunted. There she fights a twisted version of Mercury. In the heat of battle, the teleporting Mercury loses control of his power, and transports them to the world of "The Badger."
metadata.name: Crossed Wires
